Some Item Data
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance Archive (GameBoy Advance): Items: Some Item Data
By DarkDragon on Sunday, April 14, 2002 - 08:56 am:

ItemDescription
Aroma Pot Lets body and spirit relax, allowing deep sleep. Effects when you own.
Ava. HornHorn of an Avalance Beaclon. Gives "Sharp Horn".
Baisin ZFatigue preventing medicine. Gives "Iron Heart".
Bajarl PotA pot that contains the spirit monster Bajarl.
Bananaazy monster Ape's Banana. Makes your monster lazy.
BeaclnHornA Beaclon horn. Gives "Hard Skin".
BinocularsLets you see distant objects.Gives "Sniper".
Black Box Suspicious treasure box that contains an item
BlackPearl Jewelry made by rare oysters. Also for medicine.
Bone Leftover bones. Some monsters like to chew it.
Bright Gem Greatly reduces monster stress. Effects when you own.
Cold Paint Cold-resistant paint. Gives "Coldproof."
Cookies A cookie with a spicy taste. Great for snacks.
Coral Accessory from the ocean bed. Also for medicine.
Crystal Pretty stones excavated from caves. Has some value.
Diamond A rare jewel. Has great value.
Dino TailDino's prehensile tail. Gives "Flex Tail".
Disc FragFragment of a monster that looks just like a Saucer Stone.
Earth OrbOrb with the power of Earth. Gives "Earth Know."
Elec PaintLightning-resistant paint. Gives "Elec-proof."
Evil KnifeWracky's knife. Gives "Sharp Bld."
Eye DropsCleans eyes and improves eyesight. Gives "act. View".
Fire OrbOrb with the power of Fire. Gives "Fire Know."
FlowerBeautiful fragrant flower. Calms the heart.
Gaboo SoulSoul of Gaboo. Gives "Iron Fist".
Gali MaskA Gali mask. Gives "Light Aura"
Ghost StikStick that belongs to a Ghost.
Gold CupWater from this cup removes some fatigue. Effects when you own.
Golem FragFragment from a Golem. Gives "Hard Head".
Heat PaintHeat-resistant paint. Gives "Heatproof."
Holy CupWater from this cup greatly reduces fatigue. Effects when you own.
Honey CandyHoney candy. Great for snacks for monsters.
Ice OrbOrb with the power of Ice. Gives "Ice Know."
IncenseHelps spirit relax, allowing peaceful sleep. Effects ehwn you own.
Jill BeardA Jill beard. Gives "Cold Resis."
Joker MaskA Joker mask. Gives "Dark Aura".
Karianin SIncreases thinking capacity. Gives "hi-Sense".
Larox AStrength-boosting medicine. Gives "Hi-Power".
LetheRx1Medicine that makes monster forget 1st trait.
LetheRx2Medicine that makes monster forget 2nd trait.
LetheRx3Medicine that makes monster forget 3rd trait.
LetheRx4Medicine that makes monster forget 4th trait.
LetheRx5Medicine that makes monster forget 5th trait.
LetheRx6Medicine that makes monster forget 6th trait.
Life OrbOrb with Life energy. Gives "Life Know."
Logimole VResistance-boosting medicine. Gives "Hi-Resist".
LozengesClarifies your voice. Gives "Sweet Vox".
Magic OrbOrb with pure Magic power. Gives "Magic Know."
MangoSweet, southern fruit. Great for monster snacks!
MarkisWingA Markis Wing. Gives "Wind Resis".
MegaphoneHelps amplify voices. Gives "Loud Voice".
Mind OrbOrb with psychic power. Gives "Mind Know."
Mint CandyRefreshing Candy. Great to reduce stress.
Mint LeafRefreshing mint leaf works in stress. Also for medicine.
MirrorMirror with the power of the legendary monster Majin.
Mock SeedSeed of the monster Mock,who was born from an old tree.
Monol FragA Monol fragment. Gives "Magc Resis."
Mud DollA mud doll. No artistic value.
Nail FileNecessity for proper nail care. Gives "Sharp Claw".
NitroberryRefreshing taste removes fatigue from monsters.
Nuts OilNuts oil removes fatigue from monsters.
Phnx FeathrA Phoenix feather. Gives "Heat Resis."
PollenPlant's Pollen. Gives "Soft Smell".
PrettyRockA pretty rock. Not much value.
RibbonSuzurin's Ribbon. Gives "Eye Charm".
Roast NewtA bitter taste feared by monsters. Used as medicine.
ScalesScales of the Dragon Kujata. Gives "Hard Scales".
ScarfA pretty scarf accessory for Hare. Gives "Fast Footwork".
SH FruitIncreases lung capacity. Gives "Big Lungs".
ShellHard shell of a Niton. Gives "Hi-Tough."
Shiny GemRelieves a little stress from monsters. Effects when you own.
Silver CupWater from this cup removes minor fatigue. Effects when you own.
SparkleGemReduces stress in monsters. Effects when you own.
Tapaurin NIncreases tolerance to pain. Gives "Hi-Tough".
Teromean SWeight loss medicine. Gives "Hi-Speed".
Thnder OrbOrb with the power of Lightning. Gives "Ltng Know."
Tiger HornA Tiger horn. Gives "Elec Resis."
Toe ShoesShoes worn by a dancer. Gives "Grace Step".
TorlesWTRMineral water from overseas removes monster fatigue.
Trokatin XMedicine that helps one focus. Gives "Hi-Tech".
Water OrbOrb with the power of Water. Gives "Water Know."
Watr PaintWater-resistant paint. Gives "Waterproof."
WhipA whip that belonging to the mysterious monster, Doodle.
Wind DrumStrikes fear in monster's heart with scary sounds. Effects when you own.
Wind OrbOrb with the power of Wind. Gives "Wind Know."
Worm FangFang of a Worm. Gives "Sharp Fang".
ZillaBeardA Zilla beard. Gives "Watr Resis."
